entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers becoming mixed with drizzle early this evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
